info.name: Route Mobile WhatsApp Business Messaging API

request.description:
## API details:   This API is used to Broadcast WhatsApp pre-approved Messages( templates) to end user   ## API Request Details   |*Key*|*Mandatory/Optional*|*Description*| |-----|-----------------------|-------------------------| |`phone`|Mandatory|end user phone number with country code and +| |`type`|Mandatory|API type| |`template_name`|Mandatory|Name of template approved with WhatsApp| |`lang_code`|Mandatory|language in which template is approved| |`header`|Optional|Add only for multimedia template| |`body`|Optional|Add only if you have variables in the template| |`button`|Optional|Add only if you have dynamic URL redirection button in the template| |`extra`|Optional|Add only if you wish to pass any extra value in API and the same will be recieved in delivery reports|   ## `header` Field Breakdown:   header is a JSON string consisting of a set of mandatory keys that define the text or multimedia based header section of a template:

  |*Key*|*Mandatory/Optional*|*Description*|*Sample*| |-----|--------------------|-------------|--------| |`text`|Mandatory|Add only if you have template with text in the header|"header":[{"text":"{variable}"}]| |`link`|Mandatory|Add publicly hosted url for all multimedia template|"header":[{"image":{"link":"{sample image url hosted publicly starting with https:// and ending with file extension}"}}]| |`image`|Mandatory|Add only if you have image template|"header":[{"image":{"link":"{sample image url hosted publicly starting with https:// and ending with file extension( you tube URL will not work)}"}}]| |`document`|Mandatory|Add only if you have document template|"header":[{"image":{"link":"{sample document url hosted publicly starting with https:// and ending with file extension}"}}]| |`video`|Mandatory|Add only if you have video template|"header":[{"image":{"link":"{sample video url hosted publicly starting with https:// and ending with file extension}"}}]|   ## `body` Field Breakdown:   body is a JSON string consisting of a text key that defines the variables of a template:

  |*Key*|*Mandatory/Optional*|*Description*|*Sample*| |-----|--------------------|-------------|--------| |`text`|Mandatory|Add if you have variable in the template|"body":[{"text":"{variable}"}]| |`text,text`|Mandatory|Add if you have multiple variable in the template|"body":[{"text":"{variable}"},{"text":"{variable}"}]| ## `button` Field Breakdown:   button is a JSON string consisting of a set of mandatory keys that define the dynamic variable pf the call to action url redirection button of a template:

  |*Key*|*Mandatory/Optional*|*Description*|*Sample*| |-----|--------------------|-------------|--------| |`button_no`|Mandatory|Add only if you have dynamic url redirection button in the template, button_no key specified the position of dynamic url|"button":[{"button_no":"0/1","url":"{dynamic_url variable}"}]| |`url`|Mandatory|Add only if you have dynamic url redirection button in the template, url key specifies the variable part of dynamic url redirection button|"button":[{"button_no":"0/1","url":"{dynamic_url variable}"}]| ## Success Response Structure: For every success request, a JSON response is sent with key as status, message, and request_id.
  |*Status*|*Message*|*Description*|*Response Code*|*Sample*| |--------|---------|-------------|---------------|--------| |processing|message received successfully|Valid payload structure with unique request_id per request|202|{"message":"message received successfully","status":"processing","request_id":"794c3fd4-f142-11eb-8e02-0242ac120005"}​​​​|   ## Failed Response Structure: For every failed request, a JSON response is sent with key as status, message, and reason.
  |*Status*|*Message*|*Description*|*Reason*|*Error Code*|*Sample*| |--------|---------|-------------|--------|---------------|--------| |failed|unable to process request|Incorrect Authorization token|Please check the integrity/validity of the token sent|202|{"message":"unable to process request","status":"failed","reason":"Please check the integrity/validity of the token sent"}| |-|The requested URL was not found on the server. If you entered the URL manually please check your spelling and try again.|Incorrect url|-|404|{"message": "The requested URL was not found on the server. If you entered the URL manually please check your spelling and try again."}| |-|The browser (or proxy) sent a request that this server could not understand.|Incorrect payload structure|-|400|{"message":"The browser (or proxy) sent a request that this server could not understand."}| |failure|Please check API docs|Mandatory key is missing|unable to verify payload type|400|{"message":"Please check API docs","status":"failure","reason":"unable to verify payload type"}|   > *Note* : * TPS around 100 provided multi-threading is implemented and utilize keepalive connections option in HTTP Client to minimize SSL overhead and latency. * Templates are triggered to users who are out of 24 hour window.
